message.body: (1/2)That was really not painful at all i sat for over 4 hours till they had to close. And yeah... I want more :) this onr still needs anout an hour of work
Maybe you could pretend it hurt so I have an excuse to come with you next time ;-) I'm really glad it went well and not at all surprised that you want more. Ha ha. Can't wait to see it!
